title.narrative: PrOpCom Mai-karfi (strong) Procurement of services - Long + short term consultancies; Grant disbursements, Training

description.narrative: This activity ( PrOpCom Mai-karfi (strong) Procurement of services - Long + short term consultancies; Grant disbursements, Training) is a component of Rural and Agriculture Markets Development programme for Northern Nigeria (PrOpCom Mai-karfi) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £28,279,342. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Agricultural policy and administrative management, Livestock, Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development, Trade policy and administrative management, Rural development. , with the following implementing partners: Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-10-2011 and the end date is 31-12-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
